questions.question: What is the overall shape of the light bulb, considering its reflector and base?
What primary color is the light bulb's outer casing?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the light bulb's body?
What is the visible finish or texture of the bulb's surface?
What type of base does the light bulb possess for socket connection?
Describing the reflector's design, is it completely smooth or does it have any visible pattern?
Considering the image scale, what is the approximate size of the bulb's reflector?
What is the apparent light distribution pattern suggested by the reflector's shape?
Judging by the image, does the bulb appear to be equipped with any external fins or heat sinks?
Does the bulb show any visible branding, markings, or labels on its surface?
What is the general impression of the light bulb's build quality, based on its visual aspects?
Based on the image, is the bulb designed for indoor or outdoor use, if that is visually apparent?
What is the visible color of the screw base of the light bulb?
Does the image show any signs of damage or imperfection on the light bulb?
Ignoring the hand, what is the visible material of the lightbulb's support structure?
